bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Requirements for Subsurface, Vault, and Padmounted Load-Interrupter Switchgear and Fused Load-Interrupter Switchgear for Alternating Current Systems up to 38 kV
IEEE Standard Requirements for Subsurface, Vault, and Padmounted Load-Interrupter Switchgear and Fused Load-Interrupter Switchgear for Alternating Current Systems up to 38 kV

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Required definitions, ratings, procedures for performing design tests and production tests, and construction requirements for subsurface, vault, and pad-mounted load-interrupter switchgear and fused load-interrupter switchgear for ac systems up to 38 kV are specified

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
